statements: SELECT * FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employment_compliance_tracking ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employment_compliance_tracking;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT department, employee_id FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employment_compliance_tracking WHERE compliance_document IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employment_documents;
SELECT document_title, department FROM employment_documents WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT document_type, creation_date FROM employment_documents ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT document_title, document_type, department FROM employment_documents WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY document_title ASC;
SELECT document_title, document_type, department, creation_date FROM employment_documents WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_title, department, creation_date FROM employment_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract' AND creation_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT document_title, department, creation_date FROM employment_documents WHERE document_type LIKE '%Policy%' ORDER BY document_title ASC;

SELECT record_id, compliance_status, last_review_date, document_title FROM compliance_records JOIN employment_documents ON compliance_records.document_id = employment_documents.document_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY last_review_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT e.document_title, e.department, c.compliance_status, c.last_review_date FROM employment_documents e JOIN compliance_records c ON e.document_id = c.document_id WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY last_review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employment_laws;
SELECT law_name, effective_date FROM employment_laws;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documents WHERE law_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_tracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT law_name, description FROM employment_laws WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employment_laws WHERE law_name = 'Labor Law';
SELECT law_id, law_name, description FROM employment_laws ORDER BY law_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT tracking_id, compliance_status, reminder_date FROM compliance_tracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT documents.document_id, documents.document_name, compliance_tracking.compliance_status FROM documents JOIN compliance_tracking ON documents.document_id = compliance_tracking.document_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_details;
SELECT name, address FROM employee_details WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, document_link FROM employment_documents WHERE upload_date <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT employee_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_status ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT action, performed_by, action_date FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'update' ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_details WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employee_details WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM employment_documents WHERE upload_date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_status WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' AND review_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, action, action_date FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'Update' ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employment_laws;
SELECT law_name, compliance_status FROM employment_laws WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT document_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM documents ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry, location FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT employee_name, designation FROM employees WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employment_laws WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, designation, company_name FROM employees JOIN companies ON employees.company_id = companies.company_id;
SELECT violation_description, fine_amount FROM violations WHERE fine_amount > 1000 ORDER BY fine_amount ASC;
